hit_on_soft_17.description: Determines if the dealer hits on a soft 17.

blackjack_payout.description: The payout multiplier for a player blackjack.

allow_resplit_to_hands.description: The maximum number of hands a player can have after resplitting.

allow_resplit_aces.description: Allows the player to resplit aces.

hit_split_aces.description: Allows the player to hit after splitting aces.

allow_early_surrender.description: Allows the player to surrender their hand before the dealer checks for blackjack.

allow_late_surrender.description: Allows the player to surrender their hand after the dealer checks for blackjack.

DAS.description: Allows the player to double down after splitting a pair.

double_down_restrictions.description: Defines the hand values on which a player can double down. Use ["any"] for no restrictions.
